resources.string: This is a sample to demonstrate a simple implementation for requesting permission at runtime.\n\n Please click the button below to request the Camera permission and open the camera preview.
Camera could not be opened.\nThis occurs when the camera is not available, it could be already in use or if the system has denied access.
Camera permission is available. Starting preview.
Camera access is required to display the camera preview.
Permission is not available. Requesting camera permission.
Camera permission was granted. Starting preview.
